member.summary: Icon for this entity display at specific places.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Entities.Entity.FromSql
member.summary: Optional property. Only use this is this entity should always be returned using a custom query from database.

member.summary: If the FromSql require parameters to pass to SQL execute when returning the objects.

member.summary: The complete CLR type of the entity type.
